ModMetaData.name: EPOE-Forked: Alien expansion + patcher
ModMetaData.author: Tarojun
ModMetaData.description:
Collection of patch mod for certain alien races. The aim of this module is to add EPOE-Forked themed extensions to alien races that have unique body parts that do have an influence to their performance.
One common feature of alien races (especially animal themed ones) have tails, and this mod unify nearly all kinds of tails surgery to using only the generic one from this mod. This results in less item spam and no longer need to check which tails are which! The original bionic tails will remain, but should no longer be conventionally obtained. Instead, those original tails can still be used for their respective races, or used as the material to upgrade into the Advanced Bionic Tail. Or can be sold or scrapped for raw materials.
There are several kinds of patches featured, such as expansions, surgery expansions, repairs and vanilla def repairs, and each race that has been looked at, has a log in what changes are being applied.
Load order: - Humanoid Alien Races 2.0 ///// - EPOE-Forked - other EPOE-Forked modules (Optional) ///// - Alien race mods - EPOE-Forked: Alien expansion + patcher (This mod)
Please report any errors, as this mod interacts with so many different races, some changes from the race mod authors could affect what is being patched (Especially what this mod is repairing, they could of fixed it, and this mod tries to go ahead doing it again, for example.) Race authors are welcomed to contact me for advice how to handle problems that I have identified.
